mapper.sql: id, username, password, company_info, phone, email, user_type, created_at, updated_at
mapper.select: select * from user_water where username=#{username} and id!=#{id}
select * from user_water where phone=#{phone} and id!=#{id}
select * from user_water where email=#{email} and id!=#{id}
select * from user_water where username like CONCAT('%', #{sel}, '%') or phone like CONCAT('%', #{sel}, '%') or email like CONCAT('%', #{sel}, '%')
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update user_water
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_info = #{companyInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_water set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_info = #{companyInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_water set username=#{username}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_info = #{companyInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR} where id=#{id}
